languages.text: {n}Спустя пару секунд вас вдруг пронзает древний инстинкт — ощущение пристального внимания смертоносного хищника. Вы смотрите вверх: Маражай, заметивший ваш интерес, неслышно повернул голову и, склонившись, сверлит вас взглядом — насмешливым и многообещающим.{/n} "На что ты смотришь?"

{n}After a few seconds, some ancient awareness spikes in you — the rapt attention of a deadly predator is focused on you. Your eyes dart up — Marazhai has noticed your interest. Silently, he turns his head to you and leans down. His eyes bore into yours, his gaze mocking and charged with promise.{/n} "What are you looking at?"
languages.original_text: {n}Спустя пару секунд вас вдруг пронзает древний инстинкт — ощущение пристального внимания смертоносного хищника. Вы смотрите вверх: Маражай, заметивший ваш интерес, неслышно повернул голову и, склонившись, сверлит вас взглядом — насмешливым и многообещающим.{/n} "На что ты смотришь?"

Silently, he turns his head to you and leans down. His eyes bore into yours, his gaze mocking and charged with promise.{/n} "What are you looking at?"

Silently, he turns his head to you and leans down. His eyes bore into yours, his gaze mocking and charged with promise.{/n} "What are you looking at?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}过了几秒钟，你感觉到某种古老的意识在你的心中激荡，仿佛致命的掠食者正全神贯注地盯着你。你抬起了头，发现玛拉斋已经注意到了你的兴趣。他静静地转过头，俯下身来，双眼紧紧地盯着你，嘲弄的目光中充满了承诺的意味。{/n}“你在看什么呢？”
languages.original_text: {n}After a few seconds, some ancient awareness spikes in you — the rapt attention of a deadly predator is focused on you. Your eyes dart up — Marazhai has noticed your interest. Silently, he turns his head to you and leans down. His eyes bore into yours, his gaze mocking and charged with promise.{/n} "What are you looking at?"

traits.locale_text: {n}过了几秒钟，你感觉到某种古老的意识在你的心中激荡，仿佛致命的掠食者正全神贯注地盯着你。你抬起了头，发现玛拉斋已经注意到了你的兴趣。他静静地转过头，俯下身来，双眼紧紧地盯着你，嘲弄的目光中充满了承诺的意味。{/n}“你在看什么呢？”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}数秒の後、本能的な意識が心の奥から急激に湧き上がった。こちらの命さえ奪えるプレデターのギラギラとした視線が注がれている。視線を上げると、マラズハイがその意図に気付いた。男は黙ってこちらに頭を動かして身をかがめる。マラズハイの目がこちらの目を覗き込む。その視線は嘲笑を含み、確かな言葉を求めていた。{/n}「どこを見ている？」
languages.original_text: {n}After a few seconds, some ancient awareness spikes in you — the rapt attention of a deadly predator is focused on you. Your eyes dart up — Marazhai has noticed your interest. Silently, he turns his head to you and leans down. His eyes bore into yours, his gaze mocking and charged with promise.{/n} "What are you looking at?"

traits.locale_text: {n}数秒の後、本能的な意識が心の奥から急激に湧き上がった。こちらの命さえ奪えるプレデターのギラギラとした視線が注がれている。視線を上げると、マラズハイがその意図に気付いた。男は黙ってこちらに頭を動かして身をかがめる。マラズハイの目がこちらの目を覗き込む。その視線は嘲笑を含み、確かな言葉を求めていた。{/n}「どこを見ている？」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Al cabo de unos segundos, una especie de instinto primordial te pone bajo alerta, como si un letal depredador estuviese centrando toda su atención en ti. Levantas la vista rápidamente; Marazhai se ha percatado de tu interés. Sin hacer ruido, vuelve la cabeza en tu dirección y se inclina hacia ti. Su mirada taladra tus ojos; su expresión es burlona y a la vez sugerente.{/n} «¿Qué estás mirando?».
languages.original_text: {n}After a few seconds, some ancient awareness spikes in you — the rapt attention of a deadly predator is focused on you. Your eyes dart up — Marazhai has noticed your interest. Silently, he turns his head to you and leans down. His eyes bore into yours, his gaze mocking and charged with promise.{/n} "What are you looking at?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Al cabo de unos segundos, una especie de instinto primordial te pone bajo alerta, como si un letal depredador estuviese centrando toda su atención en ti. Levantas la vista rápidamente; Marazhai se ha percatado de tu interés. Sin hacer ruido, vuelve la cabeza en tu dirección y se inclina hacia ti. Su mirada taladra tus ojos; su expresión es burlona y a la vez sugerente.{/n} «¿Qué estás mirando?».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Au bout de quelques secondes, un instinct ressurgi du fond des âges se fait jour en vous : tous les sens en alerte d'un prédateur mortel sont concentrés sur votre personne. Vous relevez aussitôt les yeux et constatez que Marazhai est parfaitement conscient de l'intérêt que vous lui portez. Il tourne la tête sans mot dire et se penche vers vous avant de planter son regard dans le vôtre, un regard lourd de moquerie et de promesses réunies.{/n} « Qu'est-ce que vous regardez comme ça ? »
languages.original_text: {n}After a few seconds, some ancient awareness spikes in you — the rapt attention of a deadly predator is focused on you. Your eyes dart up — Marazhai has noticed your interest. Silently, he turns his head to you and leans down. His eyes bore into yours, his gaze mocking and charged with promise.{/n} "What are you looking at?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Au bout de quelques secondes, un instinct ressurgi du fond des âges se fait jour en vous : tous les sens en alerte d'un prédateur mortel sont concentrés sur votre personne. Vous relevez aussitôt les yeux et constatez que Marazhai est parfaitement conscient de l'intérêt que vous lui portez. Il tourne la tête sans mot dire et se penche vers vous avant de planter son regard dans le vôtre, un regard lourd de moquerie et de promesses réunies.{/n} « Qu'est-ce que vous regardez comme ça ? »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Nach einem kurzen Augenblick steigt in dir ein uraltes Gewahrsein auf – du spürst die gespannte Aufmerksamkeit eines tödlichen Raubtiers auf dir. Deine Augen schnellen hoch – Marazhai bemerkt deine veränderte Aufmerksamkeit. Schweigend dreht er seinen Kopf in deine Richtung und beugt sich herab. Seine Augen bohren sich förmlich in deine, sein Blick ist voller Spott und Verheißung.{/n} "Auf was guckt Ihr da?"
languages.original_text: {n}After a few seconds, some ancient awareness spikes in you — the rapt attention of a deadly predator is focused on you. Your eyes dart up — Marazhai has noticed your interest. Silently, he turns his head to you and leans down. His eyes bore into yours, his gaze mocking and charged with promise.{/n} "What are you looking at?"

languages.text: {n}Birkaç saniye sonra içinde atalarından gelen bir farkındalık bitiveriyor. Ölümcül bir avcının kendinden geçercesine gösterdiği ilgi, sana odaklanıyor. Gözlerini yukarı kaldırıyorsun. Marazhai, ilgini fark ediyor. Sessizce başını sana çevirerek eğiliyor. Gözlerini gözlerine dikiyor. Alaycı bakışları sana vaatler sunuyor.{/n} "Nereye bakıyorsun?"
languages.original_text: {n}After a few seconds, some ancient awareness spikes in you — the rapt attention of a deadly predator is focused on you. Your eyes dart up — Marazhai has noticed your interest. Silently, he turns his head to you and leans down. His eyes bore into yours, his gaze mocking and charged with promise.{/n} "What are you looking at?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Birkaç saniye sonra içinde atalarından gelen bir farkındalık bitiveriyor. Ölümcül bir avcının kendinden geçercesine gösterdiği ilgi sana odaklanıyor. Gözlerini yukarı kaldırıyorsun. Marazhai, ilgini fark ediyor. Sessizce başını sana dönerek eğiliyor. Gözlerini gözlerine dikiyor. Alaycı bakışları sana vaatler sunuyor.{/n} "Nereye bakıyorsun?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
